categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: The Vaynai Archipelago is a Star Wars Roleplaying Game source article published in Star Wars Gamer 8. It was written by Peter M. Schweighofer and illustrated by Ramón Pérez.

The article does not mention any subjects that did not exist in-universe outside of the three eras of play available in the first edition of the Star Wars Roleplaying Game as defined by that edition's core rulebook—the time surrounding the events of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, the Rebellion era, and the New Jedi Order era—therefore allowing game-master players to use the settings and adventure hooks described in the article in any of the mentioned time periods.

The same lack of any chronological restrictions upon gameplay is also explicitly noted in the article's companion adventure, "Topside Infiltration," which was also published in Star Wars Gamer 8. The 2008 reference book The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia did, however, establish that the tourism industry of the islands on Vaynai, as described in the article, already catered to rich and famous individuals during the reign of the Galactic Empire and that both Preena Jallop and Whuvumm owned and operated their respective businesses around the same time.
